Text:
@ extremezone

Ok, extremezone time for you to take some responsibility and become for real a VIP.I have made you to VIP directly  instead of trusted.

However: -->I dont want to see any mislabeled torrents. Either any spamlinks at other people uploads or that you get involved in flame discussions. Just simple stay out of trouble and dont let thoose "trolls" get into you.

If you need help of any kind ,join IRC channel or send a pm at forum. Dont make me regret this.
With that said, now you might understand that we are not bad guys,just that certain things/rules needs to be followed.Enjoy your VIP status and have a nice day.

@WTCSWE  ok i will not comment anymore as reply to spammers (i will use forum to report them if is too much to take) 

also if it was mislabeled torrents from me then this is history from now (i will not use dvdrip tag anymore when will not be the case aka r5's) thanks for making my job easier ;)

Glad to see you got your status back

@khan2hunter:  Your comment may be the stupidest thing i've ever read. This is a video, not a still image, so things like bad framerate, flicker, etc. don't show up in still images.

@michaelrwatson r u simple or something? we know about bad framerate and all that garbage. are u saying we cant judge the quality on the screen image. stfu. it is still a good starting off point for finding out the quality of the movie. would u rather be blind with no info about the quality at all.

Congratz with you getting your VIP status back m8, keep up the good work.

Much appreciated!
